interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Formula of Beauty Korean Shampoo and Conditioner - All Natural Sulfate free Shampoo and Conditioner set, Oily Hair, Daily Scalp Treatment for Dry Itchy Scalp - Artemisia (10.5 fl oz /300 ml)
Review Date: 2021/01/18
Store: Formula of Beauty
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting,Softening,Smoothening,Moisturizing,Strengthening,Nourishing,Clean,Itchy', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Brand': 'Formula of Beauty', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Scent': 'Rosemary,Lavender'}
Review Text: First of all the packaging is so sleek, sheen, and cute- and it does come with 2 pumps!! I wasnt expecting that but super happy as I knew I'd be using more than needed and wasting if I were just pouring straight from the bottle/s. Which leads me to my second point- I still think I used more than needed, particularly the conditioner. My hair is thin & rather short now so I don't need much as is, but because it's so dry & brittle the conditioner seemed to have a bit of difficulty actually saturating and smoothing out so I kept pumping more out and adding it. Well I ended up just clipping it back to sit for a bit like usual & let me tell you...when I took it out it was so silky smooth I was surprised it didnt fall out of the clip on it's own. The smell is a rather strong floral scent, I've noticed all my Korean hair products have a strong floral scent to them tho & personally I dont mind it. Havent used long enough for much result yet but will update.
Review Title: Too early to know results for sure but so far love it.
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

Formula of Beauty Korean Shampoo and Conditioner - All Natural Sulfate free Shampoo and Conditioner set, Oily Hair, Daily Scalp Treatment for Dry Itchy Scalp - Artemisia (10.5 fl oz /300 ml)
Formula of Beauty
{'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting,Softening,Smoothening,Moisturizing,Strengthening,Nourishing,Clean,Itchy', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Brand': 'Formula of Beauty', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Scent': 'Rosemary,Lavender'}
First of all the packaging is so sleek, sheen, and cute- and it does come with 2 pumps!! I wasnt expecting that but super happy as I knew I'd be using more than needed and wasting if I were just pouring straight from the bottle/s. Which leads me to my second point- I still think I used more than needed, particularly the conditioner. My hair is thin & rather short now so I don't need much as is, but because it's so dry & brittle the conditioner seemed to have a bit of difficulty actually saturating and smoothing out so I kept pumping more out and adding it. Well I ended up just clipping it back to sit for a bit like usual & let me tell you...when I took it out it was so silky smooth I was surprised it didnt fall out of the clip on it's own. The smell is a rather strong floral scent, I've noticed all my Korean hair products have a strong floral scent to them tho & personally I dont mind it. Havent used long enough for much result yet but will update.
Too early to know results for sure but so far love it.

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Overall Satisfaction:** The user’s satisfaction remains high, showing a consistent preference for products that provide exceptional value while exploring new options.
- **Product Preferences:** The user favors multifunctional bundles or kits that enhance their self-care routine, appreciating effective combinations at competitive prices.
- **Usage Context:** The strong commitment to personal care, particularly skin and hair health, persists, reflecting a holistic approach to wellness.
- **Material Preference:** The preference for soft, safe materials highlights the user’s conscious choice for comfort and quality in personal care items.
- **Product Benefits:** The user's proactive interest in exfoliation and scalp care is reaffirmed, now complemented by recent experiences focusing on the hydration and smoothness of hair, addressing dryness and brittleness effectively.
- **Skin & Hair Care:** The user maintains a thorough regimen tailored to various scalp and hair needs, showcasing a comprehensive mindset toward personal care.
- **Review Behavior:** Recent reviews remain positive, emphasizing satisfaction with sleek packaging and usability features like pumps. The user has noted challenges with saturation but remains optimistic, understanding the time required for assessing product effectiveness.

Recent interactions emphasize a strong value-driven approach to personal care, highlighting quality, multifunctionality, and a continued openness to trying new products while evaluating their usability effectively.
